reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions the collection of various types of information from users, indicating that the app declares the collection of data.
reply.reference: We collect this information directly from you when you provide it to us, such as when you create and account, or contact us with inquiries; and automatically as you use the Mobile App. Information collected automatically may include usage details, and information collected through cookies. By voluntarily providing us with any such information, you are consenting to our use of it in accordance with this Privacy Notice. You can choose not to provide us with certain information, URL: https://unfairadvantage.mykajabi.com/bma-privacy-page

Privacy Notice
Introduction
The Unfair Advantage (collectively, the "Company," "we," "our," or "us") knows that you care about how your personal information is used and shared. We take your privacy seriously and want to outline the measures we employ in safeguarding your personal information.
This Privacy Notice covers Company's treatment of information collected when you access the mobile application or any other linked pages, features, content, or application services offered from time to time...

and practices regarding your information and how we will treat it. If you do not agree with our policies and practices, you must stop using the Mobile App. By accessing or using the Mobile App or using any of our services, you acknowledge that you have read and accept the practices and policies outlined in this Privacy Notice, our Terms of Use, and any other Company policies or agreements in place at that time. We reserve the right to make changes to this Privacy Notice from time to time. Your c...

address and/or other information as set forth in each social Mobile App’s Privacy Notice, which page you are visiting on our Mobile App, and may set a cookie to enable the feature to function properly. reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects personal information such as name, postal address, e-mail address, phone number, geolocation, internet connection details, equipment information, account information, chat data, occupation history, date of birth, credit card information, financial and economic information, and gender.

reply.analysis: The answer is derived from the explicit mention of the types of data collected in the Privacy Policy document.
reply.reference: personal information; you may submit to us, including any content; about your preferences and demographics; geolocation, including precise and regional; about you individually but does not identify you; about your internet connection, the equipment you use to access our Mobile App, and Mobile App usage details; account information and login credentials; chat modules, messaging and email data, including related metrics; occupation history; date of birth; credit card information and other payment processing information; financial and economic information; gender; URL: https://unfairadvantage.mykajabi.com/bma-privacy-page

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly mentions multiple purposes for data collection and use, including transaction processing, marketing, customer support, legal obligations, and more.
reply.reference: The app declares the purpose of data collection and use for various activities like transaction processing, marketing, customer support, legal obligations, and more. URL: https://unfairadvantage.mykajabi.com/bma-privacy-page

To provide you with notices about your account, promotions, or other agreements.
To carry out our obligations and rights arising from any contracts entered into between you and us.

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or delete data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that users have rights under GDPR to request erasure of personal information in certain situations, object to the use of their data, and lodge complaints. Users can exercise these rights by contacting the company.
reply.reference: You may opt out of the use of your information for direct marketing purposes by company by sending us a detailed message to [email protected] URL: https://unfairadvantage.mykajabi.com/bma-privacy-page

If you would like to exercise any of those rights please contact us using the methods described in Section 11 of this Policy.

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that the app shares data with affiliates, agents, third-party vendors, service providers, business partners, and other third parties for various reasons.
reply.reference: Company may share this data with its affiliates within our corporate family, agents, third party vendors, service providers, and business partners. Company may also disclose aggregated user statistics in order to describe our services to current and prospective business partners, and to other third parties for other lawful purposes. URL: https://unfairadvantage.mykajabi.com/bma-privacy-page

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with its subsidiaries, affiliates, contractors, service providers, vendors, buyers or successors in case of a merger, divestiture, or sale, professional advisors, third party advertising partners, third party vendors, and other third parties as required by law.

content: Subsidiaries and affiliates within corporate family
Buyer or other successor in case of merger or sale

reply.analysis: Multiple third-party entities are listed in the privacy policy with which the app shares data, including various service providers, advisors, advertising partners, and parties as required by law.
reply.reference: To our subsidiaries and affiliates within our corporate family. To contractors, service providers, vendors, and other third parties we use to support our business. To a buyer or other successor in the event of a merger, divestiture, restructuring, reorganization, dissolution, or other sale or transfer of some or all of Company's assets, whether as a going concern or as part of a bankruptcy, liquidation, or similar proceeding, in which personal information held by Company about our Mobile App users is among the assets transferred. To fulfill the purpose for which you provide it. For any other purpose disclosed by us when you provide the information. To our professional advisors, including lawyers, accountants, consultants, security professionals and other similar parties when disclosure is reasonably necessary. With your consent. To third party advertising partners who may use data to serve ads for us and provide us with analytics. To third party vendors who may use data to provide you additional services and products. To comply with a subpoena, court order, administrative or governmental order, or any other requirement of law.URL: https://unfairadvantage.mykajabi.com/bma-privacy-page
